channel.title: Merc won when he should have lost
channel.description:
#### What happened? The Mercenary was contracted to 8 and even though the cult lost, he still won.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? His contract had lost the game which means he should have lost
#### Steps to reproduce: Honestly no damn clue
#### Comments: ![20180423095004_1|690x431](upload://hor24lwBi93GwHS06hs6inXFMjs.jpg)

item.title: Merc won when he should have lost
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
I’m quite sure that the suicide mechanic was removed providing the contract isn’t a neutral, so I imagine he was killed.

Read full topic
item.source: Merc won when he should have lost
